name: part_001
file: tmp_【＃百鬼あやめ４周年記念 ⧸ 3DLIVE】Nakiriayame 4th anniversary　~Hapiness to you ♡~ [mwJGZ8YU7o4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Nakiri Ayame performs 'Byoumei Koi Wazurai' on a 3D stage with floating decorative elements.
A transition screen showing a starry sky as the next stage set loads.
Nakiri Ayame performs 'ODDS&ENDS' in a celestial, starry environment.

subtitles.original: 病名恋ワズライ
subtitles.english: Byoumei Koi Wazurai

subtitles.original: #百鬼あやめ4周年記念
subtitles.english: #NakiriAyame4thAnniversary

subtitles.original: 半分個して好きって重いもん
subtitles.english: Let's split "loving" in half, it's a heavy thing

subtitles.original: 一人じゃ重くて持てません
subtitles.english: It's too heavy for one person to carry

subtitles.original: 半分個してドキって想いも
subtitles.english: Even this heart-pounding feeling

subtitles.original: 誰かと一緒じゃなきゃいりません
subtitles.english: I don't want it unless I'm with someone

subtitles.original: 友達以上になっちゃいたいのに
subtitles.english: I want to become more than friends

subtitles.original: 押しでも引いてもなびきません
subtitles.english: But whether I push or pull, you don't sway

subtitles.original: 例えば私好きになっちゃえば？
subtitles.english: What if you just fell in love with me?

subtitles.original: 例題答えも簡単でしょね
subtitles.english: Then the answer would be simple, right?

subtitles.original: 恋して病いなのだ
subtitles.english: I'm sick with love

subtitles.original: 恋の作戦上手くいきません
subtitles.english: My love strategy isn't going well

subtitles.original: 君対策しちゃうんだ呆れちゃうでしょ
subtitles.english: I end up planning for you, it's ridiculous, right?

subtitles.original: 乙女心変わる秋の空
subtitles.english: A maiden's heart is like the changing autumn sky

subtitles.original: 振り向かなきゃどこか行っちゃうんだから
subtitles.english: If you don't look back, I'll go somewhere else

subtitles.original: 君が誰かに褒められてる
subtitles.english: When I hear someone praising you

subtitles.original: 勝手に喜ぶ私ですが
subtitles.english: I'm the one who ends up feeling happy

subtitles.original: その誰かはね
subtitles.english: But if that "someone"

subtitles.original: 女の子だと少し複雑なんです
subtitles.english: is a girl, it's a bit complicated

subtitles.original: 半分個して好きって苦いもん
subtitles.english: Let's split "loving" in half, it's a bitter thing

subtitles.original: 全部は苦くて飲めません
subtitles.english: I can't drink it all because it's too bitter

subtitles.original: 半分個してドキって痛いもん
subtitles.english: Let's split the "thump", it's a painful thing

subtitles.original: 薬は痛みには効きません
subtitles.english: Medicine doesn't work for this pain

subtitles.original: 好きって荷物奪っちゃいたいの
subtitles.english: I want to take away the burden of "loving"

subtitles.original: 特別他には望みません
subtitles.english: I don't wish for anything else special

subtitles.original: 今日から私好きになっちゃえば？
subtitles.english: What if you just fell in love with me starting today?

subtitles.original: 妄想たまには必要でしょね
subtitles.english: Delusions are necessary sometimes, right?

subtitles.original: 恋して病いだよ
subtitles.english: I'm sick with love

subtitles.original: 片思いは楽しいって聞いたけど
subtitles.english: I heard that unrequited love is fun

subtitles.original: そんなの嘘連れて涙ばかりだ
subtitles.english: But that's a lie, it just brings tears

subtitles.original: でもね好きって気づけた時は
subtitles.english: But you know, when I realized I loved you

subtitles.original: 嬉しかったんだ
subtitles.english: I was really happy

subtitles.original: 半分個して好きって重いもん
subtitles.english: Let's split "loving" in half, it's a heavy thing

subtitles.original: 一人じゃ重くて持てません
subtitles.english: It's too heavy for one person to carry

subtitles.original: 半分個してドキって想いも
subtitles.english: Even this heart-pounding feeling

subtitles.original: 特別じゃなきゃやだよ
subtitles.english: I don't want it unless it's special

subtitles.original: 友達以上になっちゃいたいのに
subtitles.english: I want to become more than friends

subtitles.original: 押しでも引いてもなびきません
subtitles.english: But whether I push or pull, you don't sway

subtitles.original: 誰より私好きになっちゃえば？
subtitles.english: What if you loved me more than anyone?

subtitles.original: 理想の彼女なってみせるよ
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can be the ideal girlfriend

subtitles.original: ODDS&ENDS
subtitles.english: ODDS&ENDS

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲 ryo (supercell)
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition: ryo (supercell)

subtitles.original: いつだって君は笑われ者だ
subtitles.english: You've always been a laughingstock

subtitles.original: やることなすことついてなくて 挙句に雨に降られ
subtitles.english: Luck wasn't on your side with anything you did, and to top it off, you got rained on

subtitles.original: お気に入りの傘は風で飛ばされて
subtitles.english: Your favorite umbrella was blown away by the wind

subtitles.original: そこの野良はご苦労様と足を踏んづけてった
subtitles.english: And a stray over there stepped on your foot as if to say "tough luck"

subtitles.original: いつも通り君は嫌われ者だ
subtitles.english: As usual, you're the pariah

subtitles.original: 何もせずとも遠ざけられて 努力をしてみるけど
subtitles.english: Kept at a distance even without doing anything, even though you try your best

subtitles.original: その理由なんてなんとなくで
subtitles.english: The reason for that is just because

subtitles.original: 君は途方に暮れて悲しんでた
subtitles.english: You were at a loss and feeling sad

subtitles.original: ならあたしの声を使えばいいよ
subtitles.english: In that case, you should just use my voice
